title: Unlock the Secrets to Thriving Rice Harvests!

subtasks: Assess rice yield concerns
Understand the importance of proper transplanting
Determine optimal timing for transplanting (25-35 days after sowing)
Prepare the paddy field by leveling and adding organic manure
Choose between manual or machine transplanting
Execute manual transplanting (spacing 20x20 cm)
Follow machine transplanting guidelines provided by the manufacturer
Provide post-transplant care (keep field flooded for 7-10 days)
Monitor for and address pests and weeds promptly
Promote stronger plants and better yields through proper care
Encourage likes and sharing among farmers
Engage audience with relevant hashtags (arma, #farmingtips, #sustainableagriculture, etc.)
Assess yield concerns;
